title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.2 - Pertinent standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.2 - Pertinent standards

State Regulations

Nursing homes shall comply with all pertinent
requirements, technical standards and codes set forth or incorporated by
reference into Part 711 of this Title, including, but not limited to, chapter
19, "Existing Health Care Occupancies," of NFPA 101, Life Safety Code, 2000
edition, which is referenced in more detail in section
711.2
(a) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
